input.sentences: we went to a local art show . several artists were there . including the artist who made these beaded tops and hats .
several medims were used to make this . i think it looks like a peacock .
the time it must take to make this plate is astounding .
these tiny little pots were adorable .
my favorite was this hand made hammock . the colors are bright .
output.sentences: We were walking down main street and discovered interesting tops in a boutique window.
Although they were in different colors, both tops had a peacock motif.
We entered to see what else they had to offer and found an interesting plate that could have been fashioned in Africa.
Then we happened upon tiny, adorable, ceramic pots and I was determined to buy one of them.
As we were about to complete our tour of the store we saw a hammock and decided to try it out before we completed our purchase.
